attributes.action: bring back britain bring back hope and happiness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
training through volunteering for unemployed people rather than un accessable training schemes

this would help people to gain skills confidence and a reference 

this could also bring back british industry but enviromentally friendly manufacturing with the quailty that british products are known for.
 leading to a better happier way of life for people here rather than living with worry and debt. as well as lacking skills and future prospects we need to give people a positive outlook and good prospects for the future to change the current culture and violence and crime if people are happy it takes away the need to take risks and to cause trouble.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
